name: CAPIBuilder
description: Form builder for social impact data collection using ODK, KoboToolbox, Avni, SurveyCTO, CommCare, DHIS2, and more.

requirements.description:
Funding will be used for:
- Add a RAG pipeline to automate form creation compatible with ODK XML schema, based on word or spreadsheet CAPI drafts uploaded by the user
- Ongoing development and maintenance
- Server costs
- Documentation improvements
- Community support
-
